name: @agentic-ai/vincent-tool-erc20-transfer
description: A Vincent tool for ERC-20 token transfers created with @lit-protocol/vincent-scaffold-sdk

scripts.build: npm run action:build && tsc && npm run action:deploy
scripts.action:deploy: sh -c '[ -f .env ] && dotenv -e .env -- vincent-scaffold pkg deploy || dotenv -e ../../../.env -- vincent-scaffold pkg deploy'
